text: Maschinengewehr is German for "machine gun" (literally, "machine rifle"). The standard naming system for German machine guns was a prefix of "Maschinengewehr" (abbreviated as MG) and a two-number suffix giving the year in which the gun was designed. ==Examples== *Maschinengewehr 08 *Maschinengewehr 13 *Maschinengewehr 15 *Maschinengewehr 30 *Maschinengewehr 34 *Maschinengewehr 42 *Maschinengewehr 45 *Maschinengewehr 60 *Maschinengewehr 3 *Maschinengewehr 50 *Maschinengewehr 51 *Maschinengewehr 710-3
title: Maschinengewehr
